title: Invitation screen: change number of rows
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has opened the Invitations screen
AND 10 rows have appeared by default
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the plus button in the lower right corner
custom_expected:
THEN the Add Rows field appears, labeled Number of Rows

AND WHEN user enters a number in the field
AND user clicks Add

THEN the Add Rows field disappears
AND the chosen number of rows have been added to the Invitation screen

AND WHEN user repeats the process with a letter instead of a number
THEN no rows are added

AND WHEN user repeats the process with a special character instead of a number
THEN no rows are added.
